## SendableStabilio.sendSTBL() method

Send STBL tokens to an address.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
sendSTBL(toAddress: string, amount: Decimalish): Promise<SentStabilioTransaction<S, StabilioReceipt<R, void>>>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  toAddress | string | Address of receipient. |
|  amount | [Decimalish](./lib-base.decimalish.md) | Amount of STBL to send. |
